summary: This document is an email chain forwarding T-Mobile subscriber and call detail records for a phone number associated with Maxwell in response to a legal request (Case Number: 561616). It demonstrates law enforcement or legal efforts to obtain telecommunications records as part of an investigation.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email chain forwards T-Mobile subscriber and call detail records for a phone number associated with Maxwell, indicating she is the subject of a legal investigation.

events.title: T-Mobile records request fulfillment
events.description: T-Mobile sends subscriber information and call detail records for a phone number associated with Maxwell in response to a legal request (Case Number: 561616, Tracking ID: 2520720).

events.title: Forwarding of T-Mobile records
events.description: An email forwards the T-Mobile records regarding Maxwell's phone number to another recipient.

events.title: Final forwarding of records
events.description: The email chain with the T-Mobile records for Maxwell's number is forwarded again with the note 'FYI'.

keyFacts: A legal request (Case Number: 561616, Tracking ID: 2520720) was made to T-Mobile for subscriber and call detail records associated with a phone number linked to Maxwell.
T-Mobile complied with the request, providing records including subscriber information from 2019-07-08 and call detail records from 2019-10-30.
The records were forwarded via email on November 10 and November 18, 2019, indicating an ongoing investigative or legal process.
The document is part of the evidence file EFTA00151066, showing the collection of telecommunications data in the investigation.
